title: Restore missing admin panel access

requirements.text: Restore the admin panel link in the header navigation that was removed or hidden in Version 29. The link should be visible to authenticated users with admin privileges and navigate to '/admin'.

quotes: wow i lost my admin panell

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel link appears in the header navigation for authenticated admin users
Clicking the admin panel link navigates to the /admin route
Non-admin users do not see the admin panel link
Unauthenticated users do not see the admin panel link

requirements.text: Verify that the /admin route is properly configured and accessible in the router configuration, ensuring it renders the AdminPanel page component.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating directly to /admin route renders the AdminPanel component
Admin panel route is included in the router configuration
Access control correctly restricts non-admin users from viewing the admin panel

requirements.text: Ensure the admin role checking logic is functioning correctly and properly identifies users with admin privileges based on their Internet Identity principal.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend correctly validates admin principals against stored admin list
Frontend correctly receives and interprets admin status from backend
Admin-only UI elements conditionally render based on accurate admin status

constraints: Do not modify the existing access control authorization system
Preserve the current admin role management functionality
Do not change the AdminPanel or AdminOrders page components unless necessary for access restoration
nonGoals: Adding new admin features or capabilities
